QuestData.Title: Return to the High Commander
QuestData.Description: Return to High Commander Halford Wyrmbane at once, $n. Let him know that your mission was a success and that the few remaining villagers that were rescued are back to work.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with High Commander Halford Wyrmbane at Wintergarde Keep in Dragonblight.
QuestData.RewardText: <Halford salutes.>$B$BThe townsfolk are all back to work? Already? Outstanding, soldier! We'll get this town built back up and fortified in no time. Before long, reinforcements will be ready to join the fight with Lord Fordragon at the Wrathgate.$B$BI'm getting ahead of myself, of course, as there is much left to do here before we can even think about sending you to the aid of Bolvar.
